Using RC1...
I am using a home grown CMVC task which is performing an extract.  With RC1, I

You are trying to enable a widget that has been dispsoed.  The exception is 
valid in this case.

Please check your code to see why you are referencing a disposed widget.  This 
is not a defect in SWT.
